def search(budget, prices):
    return ','.join(str(a) for a in sorted(prices) if a <= budget)
search = lambda budget, prices: ",".join(map(str, sorted([x for x in prices if x <= budget])))

def search(budget, prices):
    return ",".join(map(str, sorted([n for n in prices if n <= budget])))

def search(budget, prices):
    return ','.join(map(str, sorted(filter(float(budget).__ge__, prices))))
search = lambda b,p: ','.join(str(i) for i in sorted(p) if i<=b)

def search(b,p):
    return','.join(map(str,sorted(c for c in p if c<=b)))

def search(budget,prices):
    return ','.join(str(num) for num in sorted(prices) if num <= budget)

def search(budget,prices):
    return ','.join(map(str, sorted(price for price in prices if price <= budget)))

def search(budget,prices):
    return ",".join(str(price) for price in sorted(prices) if price <= budget)
